svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2024-07-03T08:59:23.137Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/24.6.1 Chrome/124.0.6367.207 Electron/30.0.6 Safari/537.36" version="24.6.1" etag="uXe67TYZxNhbZ5AYhN--" type="device"> <diagram id="GMeqC_mEKwKURoYBG2VH" name="第 1 页"> <mxGraphModel dx="767" dy="677" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-25" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="85" y="188.75" width="605" height="312.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-1" value="各类应用程序" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#F94C4F;strokeColor=#000000;gradientColor=none;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="200" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-2" value="高级语言层" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FF6A43;strokeColor=#000000;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="240" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-3" value="汇编语言层" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#5BA4EC;strokeColor=#000000;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="280" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-4" value="操作系统层" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#cdeb8b;strokeColor=#36393d;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="320" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-5" value="指令集体系结构层<div style="font-size: 14px;">ISA</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="360" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-6" value="微程序层" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="400" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-7" value="逻辑电路层" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#000000;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="440" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-10" value="第1层" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="85" y="450" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-11" value="第2层" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="85" y="410" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-12" value="第5层" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="85" y="290" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-13" value="第3层" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="85" y="370" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-14" value="第4层" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="85" y="330" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-16" value="第6层" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="85" y="250" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-21" value="<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">使用与机器无关的高级语言编程，</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">无需掌握机器的底层技术细节</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">，只要掌握某种高级语言的语法规则以及算法和数据结构等方面的知识进行编程。</span>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="237.5" width="390" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-22" value="<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">使用汇编语言进行编程。由于汇编语言的每条语句都与机器语言的某条语句对应，因此</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">仍要求程序员对实际机器的内部组成和指令系统非常熟悉</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">。</span>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="275" width="390" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-23" value="<span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">对计算机的硬件资源和软件资源进行统一管理和调度</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">，提高计算机系统的使用效率，方便用户使用计算机.设计人员不仅要对操作系统的设计理论有比较深入的理解，还需要掌握具体机器的</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">指令集</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">和</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">汇编语言</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">以及适于编写操作系统软件的</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">高级语言</font></span>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="310" width="390" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-27" value="<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">定义了某计算机可执行的所有</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">机器指令的集合</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">，规定了对于每条机器指令计算机应执行什么操作，所处理的操作数应存放的位置以及操作数的类型等。</span>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="360" width="390" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-28" value="<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">将一条机器指令编写成一个</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">微程序</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">。每个微程序包含若干条</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">微指令</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">，每条</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">微指令对应一条或多条</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">微操作</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">。</span>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="400" width="390" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QiHxuQrY-uoqmwjeBmwJ-29" value="<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">计算机硬件系统的底层，由逻辑门、寄存器等</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><font color="#ff0000">逻辑电路</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">组成。</span>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="445" width="300" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
指令集体系结构层
ISA

switch.text: 指令集体系结构层 ISA

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;

div.span: 使用与机器无关的高级语言编程，

span.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;
span.font: 无需掌握机器的底层技术细节

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;

div.span: ，只要掌握某种高级语言的语法规则以及算法和数据结构等方面的知识进行编程。

switch.text: 使用与机器无关的高级语言编程，无需掌握机器的底层技术细节，只要掌握某种高级语言的语法规则以及算法和数据结构等方面的知识进行编程。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 388px; height: 1px; padding-top: 93px; margin-left: 207px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;

div.span: 使用汇编语言进行编程。由于汇编语言的每条语句都与机器语言的某条语句对应，因此

span.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;
span.font: 仍要求程序员对实际机器的内部组成和指令系统非常熟悉

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;

switch.text: 使用汇编语言进行编程。由于汇编语言的每条语句都与机器语言的某条语句对应，因此仍要求程序员对实际机器的内部组成和指令系统非常熟悉。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 388px; height: 1px; padding-top: 128px; margin-left: 207px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

span.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;
span.font: 对计算机的硬件资源和软件资源进行统一管理和调度

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;

div.span: ，提高计算机系统的使用效率，方便用户使用计算机.设计人员不仅要对操作系统的设计理论有比较深入的理解，还需要掌握具体机器的

span.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;

font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;

color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;

div.span: 以及适于编写操作系统软件的

span.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;

switch.text: 对计算机的硬件资源和软件资源进行统一管理和调度，提高计算机系统的使用效率，方便用户使用计算机.设计人员不仅要对操作系统的设计理论有比较深入的理解，还需要掌握具体机器的指令集和汇编语言以及适于编写操作系统软件的高级语言

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 388px; height: 1px; padding-top: 178px; margin-left: 207px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;

div.span: 定义了某计算机可执行的所有

span.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;

color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;

div.span: ，规定了对于每条机器指令计算机应执行什么操作，所处理的操作数应存放的位置以及操作数的类型等。

switch.text: 定义了某计算机可执行的所有机器指令的集合，规定了对于每条机器指令计算机应执行什么操作，所处理的操作数应存放的位置以及操作数的类型等。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 388px; height: 1px; padding-top: 218px; margin-left: 207px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;

div.span: 微指令对应一条或多条

span.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;

switch.text: 将一条机器指令编写成一个微程序。每个微程序包含若干条微指令，每条微指令对应一条或多条微操作。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 298px; height: 1px; padding-top: 263px; margin-left: 207px;

div.span: 计算机硬件系统的底层，由逻辑门、寄存器等

span.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;

switch.text: 计算机硬件系统的底层，由逻辑门、寄存器等逻辑电路组成。

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
